revised_title: The Project Approach to Crop Protection: Integrating Expertise for Efficient Pest Management
tldr: The article discusses the project approach to crop protection adopted by Ciba-Geigy, which aims to integrate skills and expertise from various disciplines to improve the efficiency of pest management. This approach focuses on ecological selectivity, understanding pest population dynamics, and developing target-specific methods of pesticide application. The project approach offers a solution to the complex problem of pest control in large monoculture areas, leading to better crop protection techniques and improved crop yields.
